Well, the problem is that its 30ft in diameter and practically 
impossible to dodge, so you have no choise but to allow it to destroy 
internal circuitry. If it was a normal ray, like a laser but with x-
ray, it'd be ok.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Why is Shockwave's x-ray blast illigal? It's like any other 
laser,
> except it uses x-rays.
